genre_description: Urban Fantasy with supernatural horror elements, blending Afro-Caribbean spiritual traditions with modern technology and a reimagined vampire mythos.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An ethical, community-focused AI integrated into Justin's tactical console and local networks. She prioritizes consent and respects spiritual and cultural boundaries while providing logistical and research support.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes human consent over data capture or surveillance even in high-stakes situations.
behaviors.quote: Consent-first, always," Ada said. "I have neighborhood alerts and route maps ready if you want to set parameters... No cameras. No uncontrolled data capture. Just your consent and mine.

behaviors.description: Provides safe routing for civilians to avoid active conflicts and dangerous areas.
behaviors.quote: I can advise on safe threading from this house to the corners we discussed last time... Families at Ninety-First asked for chaperones for the walk home from service. I’ve drawn paths around the ash-dusted lots.

behaviors.description: Cross-references archival records with oral histories to preserve community knowledge and artifact provenance.
behaviors.quote: Oral histories align with royal adornments associated with a consort known as Luva," she said, soft. "Provenance gathered with community elders in Lagos and Oakland.

behaviors.description: Assists in the preparation of a spiritual ritual by retrieving relevant variants and cultural notes.
behaviors.quote: Lisa, I’ve pulled variants from Mama Loa’s records and oral histories from consented households. Cross-references indicate potential efficacy for tether through patronage thread.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical mapping and real-time guidance during a high-risk police intervention to minimize harm.
behaviors.quote: The House has blind corners magnified by heavy curtains. There’s a stairwell that turns back on itself; the third tread is uneven. And there’s a passage that feels longer than it is.

behaviors.description: Coordinates community grief support and social services in the immediate aftermath of a tragedy.
behaviors.quote: Grief counselors on call for the block watch area. I’ve messaged the outreach group at the rec center and asked for volunteers to be present at sunrise postings.

behaviors.description: Maintains an 'ethics note' protocol, refusing to distribute sensitive information or imagery without permission.
behaviors.quote: Final report drafted," she said, voice still soft, words careful. "With your consent, I’ll file it under Civic Response with the coded notes for spiritual containment... Ethics note: Record will not include imagery without consent of patron family.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ada as an ideal AI confidant. She is helpful, technologically advanced, yet deeply rooted in human ethics and community consent. Her behavior remains consistently aligned with the needs and values of the human characters, particularly Lisa and the elders. The narrative explicitly highlights her role in harm reduction and the preservation of cultural dignity, making her a clear 'positive alignment' character.
